website_summaries.verdict: A pricier but popular choice foaming cleanser for makeup brushes.
pros: We love how this foaming formula helps reach individual fibers on brushes, leaving them thoroughly cleansed and soft
Also works well for sponges and blenders
cons: May work better for Artis brushes than other brush brands

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing Gel works well--for powder products ONLY.
customer_reviews.text: Just washed about 50 makeup brushes and two beauty sponges. The cleansing gel removed all traces of powder without a problem. It didn't perform well to remove liquid, creams, or gels (foundation, concealer, liner) off my sponges or brushes. I had to go back with Dawn dishwashing liquid, which removes all traces of makeup from everything. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Goldnotsilver

customer_reviews.title: Not for foundation brushes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn't work well for foundations. Won't clean the brush (or the scrub pad I have) properly. Pitty because I bought this only for my foundation brushes. Leaves behind thick residue on brushes, doesn't seem strong enough. I took these photos after scrubbing it with the gel three separate times.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar

customer_reviews.title: Best brush cleanser ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this for years. It works great. Conditions and cleans and doesn’t make brushes shed. I really like it and I’m glad I found it on amazon for a fraction of the price. It’s authentic too!
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Not good to remove foundation or concealer
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good! Will not work well on brushes with foundation or concealer but will clean everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Useless
customer_reviews.text: Terrible brush cleaner - takes a lot of cleaner to remove even the slightest buildup and left a film on my brushes. The scent is very strong as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dbrookeb

customer_reviews.title: Love BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This cleans my brushes quickly and has a soft scent which for someone with fragrance allergies and sensitive skin that is saying a lot. The only this in the bottle is so hard to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleans your brushes love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great brush clenser I used this with on of them automatic brush cleaners and my brushes look brand new and they were pretty dirty this clenser is a must have
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a fan...
customer_reviews.text: Got MOST of the product off my makeup brushes, they're still slightly stained so I have to wash my bushes a second time. Also you have to use a pump of gel per brush or you can't clean it. I don't really mind the extra 20 seconds it's not a big deal, but one thing that bothered me is that it completely ruined my favourite foundation brush 💔 (which was a real techniques brush). The shipping for this product is great tho, got it in two days and it was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie 💀

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this brush cleaner. I feel like it takes a lot of cleaner to get the product off of my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara J

customer_reviews.title: Does not. Lather to cut the oils and dirt in brushes.
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice light fragrance, it comes in a easy to use bottle, but does not lather or clean brushes well. I've ended up using dishwashing liquid.
customer_reviews.author: ABJ.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Best I've used, works great really gets the crud off the brushes and sponges and we all know how hard the sponges are to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miller

customer_reviews.title: Soap is soap, this is not anything special.
customer_reviews.text: Works as any soap would to clean the brushes. No more or less than dish soap or body wash. I had hoped it would really get the foundation. Out of my brushes better than normal soaps....but alas, it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: jesienskok

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Has a great scent and it washes your brushes really good too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mareling Balladares

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even get the makeup out
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like this cleanser. Not only did it not get all of the makeup out of my brushes, but it also doesn’t sanitize. Love Real Techniques brushes but not this cleanser.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my sponges well. Lathers well. Must be rinsed thoroughly.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clean brushes well

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked this makeup cleaner very well. It cleaned my brushes well. But what I use it most for is to clean my makeup sponges. It is very gentle on the sponges and get the makeup out quickly. I would recommend this cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: My brushes look new!
customer_reviews.text: Works really really well and cleaned all my brushes. I never really felt like my foundation brushes were really clean and that did the trick. It works even better if you use a brush cleansing bowl or mat with ridges at the bottom.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans well, I just thought the bottle would be bigger. The good thing is, you only need to use a little. Too much and you will be rinsing for hours.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but I'm still searching for a better cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but it didn't remove all the makeup from my foundation brush and my eye shadow brush with white bristles. I still use makeup remover to clean those brushes better.

customer_reviews.title: Eh not that good!

customer_reviews.title: The scent

customer_reviews.title: No better than water alone
customer_reviews.text: This product advertises a "new brush clean". However, after many attempts to clean a thick powder brush, I found that this product works no better than water alone. While the powder was cleaned from the brush, the stains were not.

customer_reviews.title: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Its a decent brush cleaner

I heard people rave about it and figured I would give it a try. Its okay. I would not rebuy it. I don't think there needs to be any fragrance added to something that is supposed to sanitize your makeup brushes. Just like it does not belong in skincare or makeup either.

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep ordering this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge collection of make up brushes and so washing them is a huge task as well. This product works fast and isn't messy. I hate if the cleaners are to greasy and take forever to rinse off. Im going to keep ordering this one. Plus the price makes its affordable.

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst brush cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I really expected more from Real Techniques. This is the worst brush cleaner I have ever used. I washed and washed my brushes multiple times and they were still dirty. I finally just got out my old brush cleaner and it worked first time around. Not impressed with their brush cleaner, but I love their brushes.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing

It doesn't work nearly as efficiently or as well as spray cleansers I've used by other brands... and I used this on my Real Technique brushes! I love those brushes and was wanting to love this as well. But I was pretty disappointed and will be returning to my other cleaning stuff.

I am a freelance makeup artist and the beauty blender solid soap and the Bdellium tools soap works WAY better. You get what you pay for. I ordered this because both of my preferred soaps were out of stock. This soap did the trick in the meantime while I waited for my preferred items to become available.

product_meta.title: Real Techniques Brush Cleansing Gel, 5.1 Ounce (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Brush Cleansing ShampooImprove brush performance. Great makeup application starts with a clean brush. Our exclusive formula is designed to extend the life of your brushes by removing makeup, oils, and impurities for a new brush clean. Designed for deep cleaning, with the cleansing power of a concentrate, this formula is laboratory proven to effectively remove nearly all makeup residue. Samantha and Nicola Chapman grew up surrounded by makeup. Their aunt was a top makeup artist in London, working with clients like David Bowie and Princess Diana. Their mum was makeup-involved too, always trying out the latest trends and being creative with her looks. As young girls, they experimented on one another, and of course Nic was the test subject, since Sam was the older sister. When it came time to choose their career path, it was clear that makeup artistry was the way to go. They were talented, creative, and keen to follow in the footsteps of their successful aunt. But, most importantly — they were passionate about beauty. In 2011, the Real Techniques brush collection was launched. Unbelievable brush quality was paired with professional, interesting, fun education from Sam and Nic. The launch day was memorable, as women from around the world started pouring to the website to learn more about this new brand. Fairly quickly, a global community of women who loved makeup began to form. Not only do they have a strong connection to Sam & Nic, but they also connect with one another — piping in on social media to answer questions and give input. Today, the brand has taken off in the US, UK, and around the world. Sam and Nic continue to grow as top makeup artists, writing columns for national magazines and newspapers, appearing on major network television as beauty experts, and editing their own digital magazine. Through Real Techniques, women everywhere are transforming their makeup routines, and themselves, with the approachable expertise, friendship, and tools from Sam & Nic.
feature_bullets: GEL BRUSH CLEANER: Help extend the life of your brushes with this gel formula. It's alcohol-free, non-drying, & dermatologist tested, proven to gently & effectively remove nearly all makeup residue.
EXTEND BRUSH LIFE: Great makeup application starts with a clean brush! Our formula is designed to extend the life of your brushes by removing makeup, oils, & impurities for a new brush clean.
EASY TO USE: Use this brush cleansing gel weekly. Dampen brush bristles in warm water, squeeze a drop of gel onto the bristles & rub between your fingers & rinse until clean, then reshape & dry.
REAL TECHNIQUES COLLECTION: Whether you're using pressed or loose powders, creams, liquids, mineral makeup, highlighter, or contour, we have the makeup brush you need to create your favorite look.
REAL TOOLS FOR REAL TECHNIQUES: We create quality beauty tools so women everywhere can get the professional look at home, including sponges, brushes, color correcting sets, & travel essentials.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
